column1: Senate Vote #6 1789-08-18T00:00:00 - TO AMEND THE ACT (1 STAT 54
column3: TO PROVIDE FOR THE EXPENSES OF NEGOTIATIONS OR TREATIES WITH THE INDIAN TRIBES
column4: AND THE APPOINTMENT OF COMMISSIONERS; SO AS TO CHANGE THE LIMIT OF THE SUM TO BE EXPENDED IN NEGOTIATING A TREATY WITH THE INDIANS
